title: New Chief of National Intelligence appointed
byline: The Defence Ministry has announced the appointment of Major General (Retired) Ruwan Wanigasooriya as the Chief of National Intelligence, effective from yesterday (January 1).

title: Body found at floating market in Pettah
byline: An unidentified body has been discovered at the Floating Market in Pettah, the police said.

title: Final phase of 2024 third school term begins today
byline: The final phase of the third school term for 2024 in government schools and government-approved private schools commenced today (January 2).

title: More details emerge on ‘Bo Tree’ accident at Matara Prison
byline: One prison inmate has been reported dead, and at least 11 others have been injured and hospitalized following an incident involving a large ‘Bo tree’ branch falling within the Matara Prison premises last night (January 1).

title: Driver in fatal New Orleans truck ramming may not have acted alone, had Islamic State flag
byline: A US Army veteran with an Islamic State flag on his truck swerved around makeshift barriers and ploughed into New Orleans’ crowded French Quarter on New Year’s Day, killing 15 people in an attack officials believe was carried out with the help of others.

title: SLCERT working to restore hacked Sri Lanka Police YouTube channel and Printing Dept’s website
byline: The Sri Lanka Computer Emergency Readiness Team (SLCERT) has revealed that efforts are currently underway to restore the official website of the Sri Lanka Department of Government Printing and the official YouTube channel of the Sri Lanka Police Department, both of which were subjected to recent cyber-attacks.

title: Inmate dead, 10 injured after tree falls in Matara Prison
byline: One prison inmate is reported dead while at least 10 others have been injured and hospitalized after a large ‘Bo Tree’ had fallen within the Matara Prison premises.
